Title: Two Days of the Condor
Writer: Alec Berg, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (executive story editor), Amy Aniobi (story editor), Dan Lyons (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: The verdict on Pied Piper's fate coincides with a startling real-life drama that makes their livestream immensely popular, and emotions run high as the gang tries to keep the company together.
